desc: Spearheading AI-driven development practices by architecting a multi-agent automation framework for an internal platform. Accelerating delivery cycles through custom LLM pipelines while mentoring the team on leveraging AI agents to maximize productivity and code quality.
Engineered a custom employee management system to replace legacy Google Sheets workflows. Provided technical support, documentation, and continuous feature enhancements.
Modernized portals for the Austrian Green Party and Swiss Telecom using Angular 16+, Spring Boot, and Ionic. Integrated Google Maps and upgraded core legacy dependencies.
Developed Angular frontends and .NET backends for tax-related tools. Managed code reviews, testing, and production bug fixes in a high-compliance environment.
Built Angular 8+ applications for a global financial consulting firm. Collaborated within a diverse Agile team using Azure DevOps.
